summary: This mod pays homage to Boudica the Iceni Queen that led a Celtic revolt against the Romans in 60 AD.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37223-0-1456404968.jpg[/img][/center]

[b]Description[/b]

[color=yellow]Not caring for the duties of someday becoming Queen of High Rock, Boudica traveled to Solitude seeking adventure but finding only a looming civil war. Bitter she waits for a companion who has use of her skills. Perhaps the rumors of this so called Dragonborn....[/color]

Boudica Is featured in SkModz by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5035689-emadwasfi/]EmadWasfi[/url] Tkanks Man!

[center][youtube]me2wGkAzQeo[/youtube][/center]

[b]Where to find her.[/b]

She resides in the Winking Skeever in Solitude.

[b]Installation[/b]

[color=yellow][b]NMM strongly recommended.[/b][/color]

There are two versions regular and Nevernude, please choose just one.

This mod contains a number of loose files that need to be added to the meshes and texture folders. Missing one during manual installation will cause face and body problems.

[b]Manual Installation[/b]

Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to the Skyrim data folder exactly as the archive shows. Be sure to enable the boudica.esp

[b]How to Uninstall[/b]

If installed with NMM use NMM and simply uninstall.

If manually installed delete:
meshesBoudica and
meshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomboudica.esp
texturesBoudica and
texturescharacterfacegendatafacetintboudica.esp
Then delete the boudica.esp in the data folder.

[b]Incompatibility[/b]

None, if using a legal copy of Skyrim and updated to the latest version.

[b]Known Issues[/b]

If you are limited in vram and running a lot of 2K or higher texture mods, this mod may cause black face in some circumstances.

[b]Used in screenshots:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34966]E ENB Final Edition by ewi65[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio by JJC71[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411]TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standalone by Frigus[/url]

[b]Images[/b]

Feel free to post your images but remember no nudity or coarse language. Keep it clean.
